name: Good Night Hotel
description:
Businessmen have turned your home into the "Good Night Hotel". Scare the customers, and keep them from falling asleep to stay alive! 

This game was made as part of the Sloyd Game Jam! We made the game in the limitations, time and theme constraints. 

Our team consisted of members:

Programmer of AI, Shop & Scare - Nic Farmer (imtrash#9516)

Programmer [Interactions & experience] -Talal Harmouch (Talal(Tullu)#6967)

Sound designer and composer - Mile Bogdanovic (Seek#7041)

We used Sloyd assets in our game including:

  • Shield 
  • Cabinet 
  •  Radio 
  • Window 
  • Chair

We were also working with a sword as well, but the interaction was complex and we didn't have time to implement before the Game Jam submission.

Additionally, we were lacking an artist and time constraints didn't allow us to add textures.
